headline.main: STIMSON SUPPORTS PLEDGES TO CHINA; Excepting Axis, He Forecasts Universal Approval of Cairo Vows -- Koreans Jubilant

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 2 -- Secretary of War Henry L. Stimson said at his press conference today that the restoration promised by the Cairo Conference to China of all territory wrested from her by Japan, including Formosa and Manchuria, would have universal approval except by the Axis nations.
abstract: Korea provisional govt Wash reprs comment
